alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 20 at 2:34PM MDT until April 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe County, Quay County, and Eastern San Miguel County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally reduced visibilities in blowing dust are possible in dust prone areas.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Quay County
